question:
You got a job offer in a different country, why did you change your job, what is the new profile about, take suggestions from your friend who is there in that country
Write a letter to your friend.
text: Hello! Hope you're in good health. I am writing this letter to share some exciting news with you that I just got a new job with increased pay.

I have shared with my profile which I was not comfortable with, for quite a long time ago, I've been looking for opportunities so that I will jump onto another domain, so recently I got a call from Telecom company. They have offered me several benefits for this particular job.

You will be glad to know that I'm hired as an "Assistant Manager" in the company in your country and there I need to be in every meeting, and you must have heard about the name that is TCS Global because it serves globally.

Basically, I will be requiring your  advice to deal with a few things in a new country, if you could help me find accommodation. Also, I require a sim card from Canada so you could guide me to where I can get it from. I hope we will meet someday when you'll be available.
I hope to see you at the airport.
